title: Wedding Salon - Girls Games
features: - A fantasy wedding salon theme makeover game
- Four beautiful brides for your selection to play
- Relax with the bride at the spa before the big day
- Make our brides even more beautiful than she already is
-Tons of styles makeup with shinny beauties on eyes, face and lip
- Design the perfect wedding! Make a beautiful arch and aisle
- Various trendy and thematic accessories to put on
- Sweet and romantic wedding photography with handsome groom
description: Do you say "YES!" to your Mr. Right? Emma/Olivia/Charlotte/Isabella finally meet their Mr. Right and welcoming their big day. But there are a lot of things need to prepare before wedding. The wedding aisle decoration is important. Hurry up! What is your dream wedding? You can suggest, because you're the wedding planner. But you also need to help our beautiful bride makeup and dressup ready. Let's start now.Download and play for FREE!See you in Bear Hugs Wedding Salon...And so much more! Come on and join us to help our beautiful brides.Having problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! You can find us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/BearHugMediaPrincessGames Or on Twitter at https://twitter.com/bear_hug_media For more information about Bear Hug Media, please visit http://www.bearhugmedia.com For more information about Wedding Salon-Girls Games, please visithttps://www.bearhugmedia.com/wedding-salon-girls-games
